title: Infinite recursion/stack overflow in `rustc_ast::mut_visit::noop_visit_expr`
body:
I made a PR ([here](https://github.com/clubby789/iced/tree/const-fns)) marking many functions as `const`, and after running `cargo build --lib --release` in `src/rust/iced-x86-js`, `rustc` crashed with a segmentation fault. ### Meta The issue occurred when using `nightly` and `1.61`, but not with `1.54 and 1.60` ``` > rustc +1.61 --version --verbose rustc 1.61.0 (fe5b13d68 2022-05-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: fe5b13d681f25ee6474be29d748c65adcd91f69e commit-date: 2022-05-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 > rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.63.0-nightly (c52b9c10b 2022-05-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: c52b9c10bfb5164015eb977ff498e0597ae63eb1 commit-date: 2022-05-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.63.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.4 ```
Segfault Backtrace

``` #8116 0x00007ffff612ea69 in rustc_ast::mut_visit::noop_visit_expr:: () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8117 0x00007ffff6142f69 in ::visit_expr () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8118 0x00007ffff612ea69 in rustc_ast::mut_visit::noop_visit_expr:: () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8119 0x00007ffff6142f69 in ::visit_expr () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8120 0x00007ffff612ea69 in rustc_ast::mut_visit::noop_visit_expr:: () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8121 0x00007ffff6142f69 in ::visit_expr () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8122 0x00007ffff612ea69 in rustc_ast::mut_visit::noop_visit_expr:: () from /home/jamie/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-3a280b26b15e2fbc.so #8123 0x00007ffff6142f69 in ::visit_expr () from
